name: Labyrinth of Princess Remix
description:
Labyrinth of Princess Remix Storyline

Event Aako and Aimi Kamikaze with the Princess began by selecting vote of the people in the country. They both had plans for the future. Both have been given a certain time. During that process, "Matsumaru Eria Holding College" school principal who "Ninjahama Matsuyama" was directed by. During this period, even though the people did what they wanted, the King began to get tired of the problems of the people and began to do evil. Two princesses were imprisoned on the castle. On this, Aimi Kamikaze found himself in an area filled with puzzles as he left the castle. Briefly; We will help a princess escape from the labyrinth of traps.
